definitions.definition: Unfaithfulness in a marriage or an intimate (sexual or romantic) relationship : practice or instance of having a sexual or romantic affair with someone other than one's spouse , without the consent of the spouse.
Unfaithfulness in some other moral obligation .

main_definition: Unfaithfulness in a marriage or an intimate (sexual or romantic) relationship : practice or instance of having a sexual or romantic affair with someone other than one's spouse , without the consent of the spouse.
secondary_definitions: Unfaithfulness in some other moral obligation .
